main: ^Someone swears they saw a UFO in the sky.
FirstChoice: ^You pull over and stare at the sky together. It's probably just a plane, but the shared excitement is priceless. (PARTY happiness +1)
SecondChoice: ^You all laugh, but the believer feels a bit silly and embarrassed. (PARTY happiness -0.5)
ThirdChoice: ^You make silly alien noises, and soon everyone joins in. It's weird, but it's your kind of weird. (PARTY happiness +1)
